content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Aug 2019Is Binfinity ICO / IEO good for investment or speculate? Many thanks.?Hi,I have been trading FX for many years, recently thinking of investing coin, ICO Binfinty coin (BFC) is the one I'm considering if it is safe to invest. website: binfinity.ch?Kindly advise.Many thanks.Regards,Adam Foo1 answerAnswerBump0

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 01 Sep 2019ICOs are generally not good investments as a lot of them are scams. This is speaking from experience after I went into a few ICOs last year and lost money in all of them.For investments, traditional equities are still a better choice but you need to know what you are doing so as not to lose money.0 comments0
